title: Q&A: Sebastien Lai on father Jimmy Lai’s Hong Kong ‘show trial’
description: The media tycoon has been in jail for three years awaiting trial under the territory's national security law.

title: Will Denmark ban the burning of the Quran?
description: Country is moving to make the burning of holy books illegal.

title: France to ban wearing abaya dress in schools: Minister
description: Move comes after months of debate over wearing of abayas in French schools, where women are banned from wearing hijab.

title: ISIL doubled territory it controls in Mali in less than a year: UN
description: UN experts say the group now controls rural areas in eastern Menaka and large parts of the Ansongo area in northern Gao.

title: ‘Iconic hero’: Wagner boss Yevgeny Prigozhin confirmed dead in crash
description: Genetic analysis confirms mercenary boss was killed after his aircraft went down in what appeared to be an explosion.

title: Iraq offers rewards for information on missing people from Gulf War
description: Baghdad calls on people with information about burial sites of missing persons from the Gulf War to come forward.

title: Donald Trump campaign raises more than $7m by selling mugshot merchandise
description: Donation haul underscores how Trump's legal woes have been a fundraising boon for his election campaign.

title: Russia warships return from 13,000km Pacific patrol with China vessels
description: Russian Pacific Fleet's largest warships participated in the joint naval exercise that came close to the United States.

title: High-level US delegation makes rare visit to rebel-held northwest Syria
description: It is the first such visit in six years since members of US Congress went to Syria led by late Senator John McCain.

title: ‘Accusing Israel of apartheid is not anti-Semitic’: Holocaust historian
description: A growing number of Jewish academics are using the term apartheid to describe Israel's treatment of Palestinians.

title: Russia confirms death of Wagner chief Prigozhin after genetic tests
description: Russian investigators say genetic tests have confirmed that Prigozhin was among the 10 people killed in the plane crash.

title: Indian PM Modi proposes full G20 membership for African Union
description: India's offer to South Africa is part of its attempt to raise issues concerning the so-called Global South.

title: Family of former British PM apologises for links to slavery
description: The apology by family of William Gladstone comes as many descendants of African slaves have sought reparations.

title: Who is Israel’s far-right, pro-settler Security Minister Ben-Gvir?
description: Far-right Israeli Minister Itamar Ben-Gvir has a history of making outrage-inciting comments and provoking Palestinians.

title: Palestinians still struggle to get enough water
description: Palestinians say they can barely get enough water to bathe their children, wash their clothes.

title: Palestinians flock to Gaza’s beaches to bid summer holidays farewell
description: In a hot summer filled with regular power blackouts, the Gaza seashore is the only escape for Palestinians.

title: White man kills three Black people in racially motivated attack
description: Jacksonville's sheriff says a white gunman who killed three people at a Dollar General store hated Black people.

title: ‘Basketball mecca’: FIBA World Cup passion spikes in co-hosts Philippines
description: With its undying love for basketball, the Philippines is thrilled to be co-hosting the 2023 FIBA World Cup.

title: Florida shooting: Here’s what we know so far
description: A white man armed with an assault-style rifle kills three Black people in Jacksonville in a racially motivated attack.

title: Russia will struggle to salvage the Wagner empire
description: Prigozhin’s demise may be an attempt to show strength but the world still sees weakness.

title: Romania gas station hit by deadly explosions
description: Authorities say 57 others, including 39 firefighters, were injured in the explosions near the capital, Bucharest.

title: Xi Jinping calls for protection of ‘hard-won stability’ in Xinjiang visit
description: Chinese president visited far western region where the UN has accused China of possible 'crimes against humanity'.

title: US military helicopter crashes off northern Australia, 20 Marines on board
description: Rescue efforts are under way with some of those on board still 'unaccounted for'.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 550
description: As the war enters its 550th day, these are the main developments.

title: Zimbabwe’s President Mnangagwa wins second term, opposition rejects result
description: Elections commission says Mnangagwa won 52.6 percent of the vote compared with 44 percent for challenger Nelson Chamisa.

title: ‘Suffering is continuing’: Mnangagwa declared winner in Zimbabwe election
description: Voters fear economic disaster as incumbent Emmerson Mnangagwa is returned for a second term.

title: Gunman kills three Black people in Florida hate crime: police
description: The two men and one woman were shot dead inside a discount store in the town of Jacksonville.
